data.title: Quest CFO Gets 16 Years After Fraud Conviction
data.meta_description: A federal judge sentenced former Quest Resources Corp. Chief Financial Officer David Grose to 16 years in prison Monday for filching more than $1 million from his oil and gas exploration company as part of an investment scheme.
